title: SET_PED_CAN_PLAY_AMBIENT_IDLES
content:
0x8FD89A6240813FD00xB5AD044E// SetPedCanPlayAmbientIdles
void SET_PED_CAN_PLAY_AMBIENT_IDLES(Ped ped, BOOL bBlockIdleClips, BOOL bRemoveIdleClipIfPlaying);Parameters:ped: Ped index.bBlockIdleClips: If true, prevents a ped from playing an idle animation this frame.bRemoveIdleClipIfPlaying: If true and the ped is playing an idle animation, the clip is stopped.Prevents a ped from playing ambient idle animations.Note: This native must be called every frame.
codeBlocks:
// SetPedCanPlayAmbientIdles
void SET_PED_CAN_PLAY_AMBIENT_IDLES(Ped ped, BOOL bBlockIdleClips, BOOL bRemoveIdleClipIfPlaying);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_PED_CAN_PLAY_AMBIENT_IDLES
SetPedCanPlayAmbientIdles(ped, false, false)
